file.name: common-responses.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.2"
info:
  version: 15.3.0
  title: "Common Responses"
paths: {}
components:
  responses:
    PetsListResponse:
      description: returns a list of pets
      headers:
        x-session-id:
          $ref: '../../headers/common-headers.yaml#/components/headers/x-session-id'
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '../common-types.yaml#/components/schemas/PetsList'
